public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type InputBindingCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表 物件的已排序集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的物件衍生自有名為。All objects that derive from have an named . 所有的物件衍生自有名為。All objects that derive from have an named . 不過，如果這些集合中設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，則集合中的項目必須是衍生的類別而非直接物件。However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. 這是因為不支援的預設公用建構函式。This is because does not support a default public constructor. 因此，在項目中，設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常會是衍生的類別支援的預設公用建構函式，例如或。Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples 下列範例會建立並將它與相關聯。The following example creates a and associates it with a . 新增至上。The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]
